UpperArmsWtBenchDip.name: Weighted Bench Dip
UpperArmsWtBenchDip.preparation: Sit on inside of one of two benches placed parallel, slightly less than legs length away. Place hands on edge of bench. Straighten arms, slide rear end off of edge of bench and position heels on adjacent bench with legs straight. Have assistant place weight on lap near hips.
UpperArmsWtBenchDip.execution: Lower body by bending arms until slight stretch is felt in chest or shoulder, or rear end touches floor. Raise body and repeat.
UpperArmsWtBenchDip.comments: Bench height should allow for full range of motion. If assistant is not available, place weight on lap sitting on floor or edge of bench.
UpperArmsWtBenchDip.synergists: latissimusdorsi, pectoralisminor, pectoralisclavicular, deltoidanterior, levatorscapulae, pectoralissternal, rhomboids

UpperArmsWtPushup.name: Weighted Close Grip Push-up
UpperArmsWtPushup.preparation: Lie prone on floor with hands under shoulders or slightly narrower. Position body up off floor with extended arms and body straight. Partner can place weight plate(s) on back if needed.
UpperArmsWtPushup.execution: Keeping body straight, lower body to floor by bending arms. Push body up until arms are extended. Repeat.
UpperArmsWtPushup.comments: Both upper and lower body must be kept straight throughout movement. Exercise can be performed without additional weight (See Close Grip Pushup without weight). If additional weight is used, partner will need to add and remove weight, and keep weight from sliding off back. See wider grip pushup.

UpperArmsWtTriDip.name: Weighted Triceps Dip
UpperArmsWtTriDip.preparation: Place weight on dip belt around waist or place dumbbell between lower legs just above feet. Mount shoulder width dip bar, arms straight with shoulders above hands. Keep hips straight.
UpperArmsWtTriDip.execution: Lower body until slight stretch is felt in shoulders. Push body up until arms are straight. Repeat.
UpperArmsWtTriDip.synergists: latissimusdorsi, pectoralisminor, pectoralisclavicular, deltoidanterior, levatorscapulae, pectoralissternal, rhomboids
